ComicInfo.Summary: The Darklyte armor is almost within Aalok's grasp, but the armor itself is not without its protection. It's up to our heroes to reach the armor before Aalok and his cohorts can defeat the armor's mysterious guardian. Meanwhile, the Elves of Yattannia come in full force to the aid their new allies, but with Aalok so close to his goal and the already daunting presence of the Dataran Horde, can our heroes possibly hope to turn back the tide of battle?
ComicInfo.Title: Fallen Comrades
